About Us

Your Trusted Healthcare & Teaching Institution

IQ City Medical College Hospital, Durgapur, is the region's first multispeciality hospital with an attached medical college. As part of the 100-acre IQ City Knowledge & Health Campus, it provides cutting-edge healthcare in a secure, compassionate, and affordable setting.

Total Happy Customers
